name: uncoated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with no coating (= a layer of a particular substance that covers a surface): It's made from recycled, uncoated paper. Moisture will pass through the uncoated fabric.
More examplesFewer examplesIt comes in the form of a white, round, uncoated tablet, scored on one side.Uncoated cast iron rusts if it gets wet and isn't dried immediately.The uncoated steel pipes used in oil and gas pipelines had to be replaced every two or three years, because of the corroding effect of hydrogen sulphide.
